title: Sun Transit in the 6th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: The Sun transiting your sixth house shifts focus toward discipline, service, problem-solving, and self-improvement. You become more conscious of duties, health routines, and daily responsibilities. Confidence expresses through competence rather than display. There is a strong desire to overcome obstacles, competitors, or inefficiencies. However, ego clashes can arise in work environments if flexibility is lacking. When handled consciously, this transit strengthens resilience, leadership through service, and the ability to win challenges with consistency.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Identity connects with responsibility and effort.
Pride comes from being useful and capable.
Focus shifts from spotlight to efficiency.

sections.heading: Career
points: Growth comes from consistency, not authority.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Ego clashes possible in daily interactions.
Less tolerance for inefficiency in others.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Income ties closely to effort and service.
Expenses may rise on health or routines.

sections.heading: Mental & Inner State
points: Mind focuses on fixing and improving.

closing: The Sun in the 6th house refines leadership through service. When effort is guided by awareness, challenges turn into lasting strength.
